pr_title: Improve robustness of Query Result serializations

timeline.message:
Improve robustness of Query Result serializations

Makes query result serialization more robust by propagating possible
IOExceptions that can occur during shard level result serialization to the
caller instead of throwing AssertError that is not intercepted.

Fixes #54665

replies.bodyText: In general when there is an IOException, you're in big trouble anyway, and trying to handle it is quite heroic. Since the signature of this method throws Exception, I'd be in favor of removing this catch block too. The root cause of the problem is that StreamOutput throws an IOException for something that is not I/O related.
